sent.orig: If time quote unavailable, we will always provide a compound delayed quote.
sent.trans: 如果即时报价无法取得，我们会一直提供混合的延迟报价。

sent.orig: No any trouble for tel busy,nobody quote,quote slowly.
sent.trans: 无需为电话打不通，电话通了没人报价，报价速度慢而烦恼。

sent.orig: If the quote is not provided in English, please a written explanation attached to the quote.
sent.trans: 如果报价不是英文得，请在报价后附上书面解释说明。

sent.orig: Look at them all over themselves trying to get a quote.
sent.trans: 看看他们大献殷勤为了得到一句话。

sent.orig: Please quote the price on CIF Shanghai basis.
sent.trans: 请贵公司报来CIF上海价格。
